Package src.UI

Class PatientMedicalRecordUI

java.lang.Object
src.UI.PatientMedicalRecordUI
public class PatientMedicalRecordUI extends Object
The PatientMedicalRecordUI class provides a user interface for managing and displaying a patient's medical record, allowing patients to view, edit, and interact with medical history and appointment outcome records.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PatientMedicalRecordUI(MedicalRecord medicalRecord, Patient patient)
    Constructs a PatientMedicalRecordUI instance for the specified medical record and patient.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayAppointmentOutcomeRecord(IListDisplayableView<Appointment> appointmentListView, IDisplayableView<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> appointmentOutcomeView)
    Displays the appointment outcome records associated with the patient's appointments.
    void
    displayMedicalRecord(IListDisplayableView<MedicalHistory> medicalHistoryView)
    Displays the patient's medical record details, including personal information and medical history.
    void
    editMedicalRecord()
    Allows the patient to edit specific fields in their medical record, such as email address and phone number.

  • Constructor Details

    • PatientMedicalRecordUI

      public PatientMedicalRecordUI(MedicalRecord medicalRecord, Patient patient)
      Constructs a PatientMedicalRecordUI instance for the specified medical record and patient.
      Parameters:
      medicalRecord - The medical record of the patient.
      patient - The patient associated with this medical record.

  • Method Details

    • displayMedicalRecord

      public void displayMedicalRecord(IListDisplayableView<MedicalHistory> medicalHistoryView)
      Displays the patient's medical record details, including personal information and medical history.
      Parameters:
      medicalHistoryView - A view component to display the patient's medical history.

    • editMedicalRecord

      public void editMedicalRecord()
      Allows the patient to edit specific fields in their medical record, such as email address and phone number.

    • displayAppointmentOutcomeRecord

      public void displayAppointmentOutcomeRecord(IListDisplayableView<Appointment> appointmentListView, IDisplayableView<AppointmentOutcomeRecord> appointmentOutcomeView)
      Displays the appointment outcome records associated with the patient's appointments. Allows the user to select an appointment to view its outcome record.
      Parameters:
      appointmentListView - A view component to display the list of appointments.
      appointmentOutcomeView - A view component to display the outcome record of a selected appointment.
